column1: #Text=Lin says : " I ca n't believe I 'm saying this , but I agree with the Avatar . "
#Text=Lin says : " I expected this kind of cut - and - run response from Tenzin .
#Text=The council is not changing its position , Lin .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Now just a moment , Tenzin .
#Text=Let us hear what our esteemed Chief of Police has in mind .
#Text=" Lin says : " If you keep the arena open , my metalbenders and I will provide extra security during the championship match .
#Text=There 's no better force to deal with the chi blockers .
#Text=Our armor is impervious to their attacks .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Are you saying that you will personally take responsibility for the safety of the spectators in the arena ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " It is hard to argue with Chief Beifong 's track record .
#Text=If she is confident her elite officers can protect the arena , then she has my support .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " And good luck to you , Chief Beifong .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " A word please , Lin .
